description: You make conscious choices in the gear you use – and in its materials and construction. Created for performance on the trail and delivering a clean aesthetic that’s distinctly Arc’teryx, the lightly insulated Coelle provides complete weather protection and balanced warmth for spring and summer hikes. Bio-based and made without harmful PFCs, the breathable GORE-TEX ePE fabric seals out rain and wind, and the soft Octa® Loft insulation breathes to help regulate temperature.
name: Coelle Lightweight Jacket - Womens
